md:
giải nghĩa từ "shakespeare" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Shakespeare (noun) - nhà soạn kịch, nhà thơ

* Meaning: A famous English playwright and poet who wrote many famous plays, such as "Romeo and Juliet" and "Hamlet".
* Example sentence: "Shakespeare's plays are still widely performed today."
* Related words: playwright, poet, literature, drama
* Antonyms: none

Shakespearean (adjective) - thuộc về Shakespeare, theo phong cách Shakespeare

* Meaning: Relating to or characteristic of Shakespeare's plays or poetry.
* Example sentence: "The Shakespearean sonnet is a 14-line poem with a specific rhyme scheme."
* Related words: Elizabethan, Renaissance, classical, literary
* Antonyms: modern, contemporary

Shakespearean (noun) - người yêu thích Shakespeare, người nghiên cứu Shakespeare

* Meaning: A person who studies or is an expert on Shakespeare's works.
* Example sentence: "The Shakespearean scholar spent years researching the playwright's life."
* Related words: expert, scholar, researcher, academic
* Antonyms: none

giải nghĩa từ "shakespeare" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

Shakespeare (noun) - nhà soạn kịch, nhà thơ

  • Meaning: A famous English playwright and poet who wrote many famous plays, such as "Romeo and Juliet" and "Hamlet".
  • Example sentence: "Shakespeare's plays are still widely performed today."
  • Related words: playwright, poet, literature, drama
  • Antonyms: none

Shakespearean (adjective) - thuộc về Shakespeare, theo phong cách Shakespeare

  • Meaning: Relating to or characteristic of Shakespeare's plays or poetry.
  • Example sentence: "The Shakespearean sonnet is a 14-line poem with a specific rhyme scheme."
  • Related words: Elizabethan, Renaissance, classical, literary
  • Antonyms: modern, contemporary

Shakespearean (noun) - người yêu thích Shakespeare, người nghiên cứu Shakespeare

  • Meaning: A person who studies or is an expert on Shakespeare's works.
  • Example sentence: "The Shakespearean scholar spent years researching the playwright's life."
